name: One-0 Genesis
description:
Genesis is a fast paced arcade style racing-shooter game. You can play by yourself, or local with a friend! One person drives the bike with WASD or a controller and one person shoots with the mouse.

Race through Viktropolis on your futuristic Speeder bike, a sci-fi cityscape owned by the corporation Genesis. You're a member of the One-0 Slayers trying to escape the post apocalyptic city while being attacked by robotic spider-mantis hybrids known as Midis.  Take down the Midis bots manufactured from the evil corporation Genesis, dodge through narrow city streets and survive, all in a high-speed bike chase!

Controls: 

Keyboard: 

WA: Accelerate / Decelerate

SD: Turn Left/Right

Left Mouse Button: Shoot

Controller: 

Right trigger: Accelerate 

Left Trigger: Decelerate

Left Stick: Turn Left / Right
